frame.name: Guest_and_host
frame.definition:
<def-root>Two individuals, the <fen>Guest</fen> and the <fen>Host</fen> are in a temporary social relationship within which the <fen>Host</fen> provides use of a location or resources for the <fen>Guest</fen> at a location highly associated with the <fen>Host</fen> (in many cases, where the <fen>Host</fen> lives or works). The <fen>Guest</fen> is not expected to reciprocate the hospitality of the <fen>Host</fen> while the relationship holds, though may be expected to act as <fen>Host</fen> at a later time.
<ex><fex name="gue">Commander Silvers</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="hos">the President's</fex> <t>guest</t> <fex name="Time">last week</fex> <fex name="hos_loc">at the White House</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Host">Steve Stephens</fex> will <m>be</m> <fex name="Guest">your</fex> <t>host</t> <fex name="Duration">for the weekend</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Host
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> provides a location and/or resources for the <fen>Guest</fen> at the <fen>Host_location</fen>.
<ex>Commander Silvers <m>was</m> <fex name="hos">the President's</fex> <t>guest</t> last week.</ex> <ex>Would <fex name="hos">you</fex> please <m>be</m> the <t>host</t> for our visiting scholar this time around?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Guest
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Guest</fen> receives the hospitality of the <fen>Host</fen>.
<ex><fex name="gue">Commander Silvers</fex> <m>was</m> the President's <t>guest</t> last week.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act whereby a focal participant achieves an action indicated by the target.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of the relationship.
<ex>I was Manu's <t>guest</t> <fex name="Duration">for few days</fex> in Allepey, in a very beautiful old house.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Host_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location associated with the <fen>Host</fen>, where the <fen>Guest</fen> is staying, working, etc.
<ex>Edward VIII <m>was</m> a <t>guest</t> <fex name="Host_location">of my hotel</fex> in 1920.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the guest-and-host relationship holds.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A trait or characteristic of the <fen>Guest</fen> or <fen>Host</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: guest.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who is invited to visit someone's home or take part in a function.

lexUnit.name: host.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who receives or entertains other people as guests.
